title: Feature Request - Add option for Connections and Config panel display at the same time when unpinned
author: mtorres10
body_snippet:
Add an option so Connections and Config tabs both display at the same time on click when "unpinned".

## Expected Behavior
When Connections and Config tabs are **"unpinned/hidden/collapsed"** add an option that when clicking on either, it will display both tabs. Similar to the behavior when both tabs are **"pinned/visible/uncollapsed"**.

In my humble opinion, is easier to work with remote connections when you have both Connection and Config tabs available at the same time, regardless if is...
